summary: Researcher in speech production and medical imaging (rtMRI, EMA) focusing on co‑articulation, tongue shape variability, articulatory symmetry, and velum dynamics. Currently working as Project Associate at SPIRE Lab, IISc.

experience.organization: SPIRE Lab, Indian Institute of Science (IISc)
experience.description: Leading research in speech production using advanced medical imaging techniques including real-time MRI and electromagnetic articulography.
achievements: Co-authored paper accepted at Interspeech 2025; nominated for Best Student Paper Award
Developed comprehensive rtMRI data processing toolkit
Built EMA visualization suite for articulatory analysis

publications.title: A real-time MRI study on asymmetry in velum dynamics during VCV production with nasal sounds
publications.authors: Shreya Karkun, Chitra Shyam, Vishakh D, Sreeja Krishnan

awards: Best Student Paper Award – nomination, Interspeech 2025
